Package pbxuniverse

Class PBXBoard

java.lang.Object
pbxuniverse.PBXBoard
public class PBXBoard extends Object
Settings, data and utilities for individual Pixelblaze Output Expander (PBX) boards.

    • addChannelAPAClock

      public PBXDataChannel addChannelAPAClock​(int chNumber, int frequency)
      Create clock channel for APA102/Dotstar LEDs APA102 LEDs require that one output channel on the expander board be set up as a dedicated clock channel. If you have multiple APA102 strips attached to a board, you can connect them all to the same clock channel. Valid clock speeds range from 250khz to 20Mhz
      Parameters:
      chNumber -
      frequency -
      Returns:
      created PBXDataChannel object

    • getChannel

      public PBXDataChannel getChannel​(int id)
      Gets the channel object specified by id
      Parameters:
      id - - number of channel to retrieve
      Returns:
      PBXDataChannel object if found, null otherwise

    • getChannelList

      public LinkedList<PBXDataChannel> getChannelList()
      Gets the list of channels associated with this board. The list may be empty.
      Returns:
      channel list

    • getGlobalBrightness

      public float getGlobalBrightness()

    • setGammaCorrection

      public void setGammaCorrection​(float g)
      Sets gamma correction factor (power curve exponenent) for all channels on the specified board. Setting at the board level will override all previous settings for channels attached to the board.
      Parameters:
      g - global gamma factor (0..1)

    • getPixelCount

      public int getPixelCount()
      Returns total number of pixels attached to this board
      Returns:

    • setBrightness

      public void setBrightness​(float b)
      Sets brightness for all channels connected to this board. Setting brightness at the board level will override all previous settings for attached channels.
      Parameters:
      b - (0..1) brightness

    • setColorCorrection

      public void setColorCorrection​(float r, float g, float b)
      Sets r,g and b color correction factors - values in the range 0..1 that will be multiplied with pixel colors to produce the particular 'white' you want to match. Settings made at the board level will override previous settings for attached channels.

    • setDrawMode

      public void setDrawMode​(DrawMode dm)
      Sets pixel drawing mode, either DrawMode.FAST (brightness & gamma adjustment only) or DrawMode.ENHANCED (brightness, gamma, color correction, color depth expansion if supported by LEDs). DrawMode can be changed at any time. Settings made at the board level will override previous settings for attached channels.
